═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
                    INCIDENT REPORT: 10 YEARS AGO
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Thermal output significant. Structure fully engaged.

The Blackwood residence. 0300 Hours.

Windows blowout outward. Pressure differential consistent with accelerant.

Chief Miller stands at the perimeter. His badge reflects the orange light.

"Circuits," Miller states. Official cause of ignition. "Old wiring. Shame."

He places a hand on your shoulder. Restraining force: Minimal.

"Go home, kid. Nothing to see."

Sound of structural collapse from interior. Miller checks his watch.

Timeline consistent with controlled burn.

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
text.traumatic:
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
                    SCAR TISSUE: 10 YEARS AGO
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

The heat isn't hot. It's cold. It burns like ice against your skin.

The Blackwood house isn't burning down. It's burning *up*. The smoke is falling back into the chimney.

There are people on the lawn. Their mouths are open but the sound has been cut.

Miller is there. His hand on your shoulder is a vice. A clamp. He's holding you down.

"Circuits," Miller says. But his eyes are bleeding. "Just... wiring."

Inside the house, something slams against the front door. From the inside.

It knocks three times. 

Then four.

Then seven.

Miller smiles. It's the wrong shape.

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
